tafsirQuiz.question: What is the main message of Surah As-Saff, Ayah 1?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: In the universe, with the exception of the conduct of human beings, there is no inconsistency anywhere. In this world wood is always wood and anything which has the appearance of being iron or stone will be iron or stone in actual experience
distractors: This verse describes the creation of mankind
This verse is about the battles of early Muslims
This verse talks about the Day of Judgment only

tafsirQuiz.question: What key concept does this verse highlight?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: They even used to make false allegations against Moses in order to justify the bad treatment they meted out to him. After making a pledge, man, by breaking it is taken even further away from the Truth than before
distractors: This verse gives rulings on trade and commerce
This verse promises paradise to the righteous
This verse warns about the punishment of disbelievers

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Similarly, in the ancient divine scriptures there was a clear prediction made about the Prophet Muhammad. But when he actually appeared, both the Jews and Christians rejected him
distractors: This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse discusses the creation of the universe

tafsirQuiz.question: Which concept is emphasized in Surah As-Saff, Ayah 7?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: This was a forecast made in the Quran under the most unfavourable conditions in the year 3 Hijrah. In this verse ‘He may cause it to prevail over all religions’ means that in terms of intellectual supremacy, all non-monotheistic beliefs about God and religion in the world were to be demolished an...

This verse promises paradise to the righteous
This verse gives rulings on trade and commerce

tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse primarily teach us?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: But, one receives the profit from worldly trade in this world, while in the religion-oriented trade, one receives the profit with further additions only in the Hereafter
distractors: This verse describes the creation of mankind
This verse is about the battles of early Muslims
This verse talks about the Day of Judgment only

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The believer must of his own accord follow the commands of God relating to worship, morality and dealing justly with people. Since it is a task which is seen as desirable by God Himself and is performed by servants of God, it is, therefore, called ‘helping God’
